LanguageData.rxSleepingGas.label: sleeping gas
LanguageData.rxSleepingGas.description:
Effects of inhaled sleeping gas. As concentration increases, the body becomes less capable until eventually falling asleep.
Recovers naturally over time, but only if no additional gas is inhaled.
LanguageData.rxSleepingGas.stages.tired.label: tired
LanguageData.rxSleepingGas.stages.drowsy.label: drowsy
LanguageData.rxSleepingGas.stages.sleepy.label: sleepy
LanguageData.rxSleepingGas.stages.out_cold.label: out cold
